channel.title: tcx on Yet Another Iteration
channel.description: Recent content in tcx on Yet Another Iteration

item.title: Ploting your MTB track with R
item.description: In this RNotebook we’ll read a TCX and GPX files, used to track physical training and exercises evolving GPS and paths used by some workout Mobile Apps and Devices. Particularly we’ll will process one TCX file containing a MTB ride mine and transforming the a useful R data.frame ploting the ride track over a map.
